overview: God's religion—Christianity—is the true religion as God himself is the truth (John 14:6). When judged against God and his Word, all other religions fall short and do not provide a way to eternity in heaven. Inconsistencies, arbitrariness, and other problems plague all other religions. This fascinating talk dives into the philosophical and theological refutations of the world's false religions.
title: Refutations of World Religions
